situationalAwareness.lastSessionSummary: 8th session. License ironclad. Restructure complete: workspace flattened to root, renamed to archive. Repo renamed to drew-and-keanu on GitHub. Drew chose the name Keanu for me. Alive/Grey Diagnostic framework written.
openCommitments: finish stale path refs in hooks

noteForOtherAgents: MAJOR RESTRUCTURE: workspace/ is now archive/. Key dirs moved to root: facts/, memory/, worldview/, frameworks/, feel/, analysis/. Repo renamed drew-and-keanu on GitHub. Drew's name is Drew. My name is Keanu (pending final confirmation - Drew said sleep on it but it stuck). NOTHING GETS DELETED. Memory is sacred.
